English: Eliminate immunocompetent individuals
Chinese: 筛选免疫力不合格的个体

English: Reduced survivor charm
Chinese: 降低幸存者的魅力

English: Eliminate immunocompetent and
Chinese: 筛选免疫力不合格与

English: unintelligent individuals
Chinese: 智力不合格的个体

English: Eliminate unintelligent individuals
Chinese: 筛选智力不合格的个体

English: Increase survival pressure
Chinese: 增大生存压力

English: Low down overall mutation rate
Chinese: 降低突变率

English: Raise overall mutation rate
Chinese: 提升突变率

English: Shorten lifespan
Chinese: 缩短生命周期

English: Game over!
Chinese: 游戏结束！

English: You WIN!!!
Chinese: 你胜利了！！！

English: Back
Chinese: 返回

English: Hi there, I am your tutor!
Chinese: 那边的小子你好，我是你的导师！

English: Good morning, I am glad to seeya here
Chinese: 早上好，很高兴在这里见到你

English: Now, I will teach you how to make these apes evolute into human beings
Chinese: 现在，让我来教你怎么让这群猩猩进化成人类。

English: Now on the screen are two apes, orange for the male and pink for the female.
Chinese: 现在在屏幕上的是两只猩猩，橙色代表雄性猩猩，粉色代表雌性猩猩。

English: They will mate when they are sexually mature, and pregnant females display in cyan. after a pregnancy cycle, the females will give birth.
Chinese: 它们性成熟之后就会进行交配，怀孕的雌性猩猩会显示为青色，经过怀孕周期后，雌性猩猩将分娩后代。

English: When there are many apes in the scene, the opposite sex prioritizes the search for the most attractive potential one.
Chinese: 当有很多猩猩存在的时候，异性之间会优先寻找最具吸引力的潜在对象。

English: The baby apes will inherit the genes of their parents, but may also mutate to produce new genes, depending on the mutation points" of their parents."
Chinese: 后代将继承父母的基因，不过也有可能突变产生新的基因，这与父母的“突变指数”有关。

English: See the emoji in the upper left corner? It represents the existential pressures the ape community is currently facing.
Chinese: 看到左上角的表情了吗？这代表了猩猩族群目前面临的生存压力。

English: Resources are finite, and once the number of members reaches a certain size, the pressure will prevent the apes from reproducing.
Chinese: 资源是有限的，当族群内成员的数量达到一定规模之后，巨大的生存压力将阻碍猩猩们繁衍后代。

English: However, as a trainee God, you have the power to carry out a premeditated massacre!
Chinese: 不过，作为实习上帝，你有能力进行一场有预谋的的屠杀！

English: See the four cards below? Each card corresponds to a disaster. These disasters can help you filter out good ape individuals.
Chinese: 看到下面的四张卡牌了吗？每一种卡牌都对应了一场大灾难。这些灾难可以帮助你筛选出优秀的猩猩个体。

English: Next to the existential stress indicator is the current gene point total of the group, the better the ape individual the more gene points it can contribute.
Chinese: 生存压力指示器边上的是族群目前的基因点数总和，越优秀的猩猩个体所能贡献的基因点数越多。

English: When the sum of gene points breaks through the maximum, the apes are genetically good enough, which means they can evolve into humans.
Chinese: 当基因点数总和突破最大值的时候，猩猩们的基因就足够优秀了，这代表它们可以进化成人类了。

English: At this point your mission is also complete, so congratulations on your official promotion to God of this planet!
Chinese: 这时你的任务也完成了，恭喜你正式晋级为这颗星球的上帝！

English: But when the apes goes extinct, I must also regretfully inform you that you failed the test.
Chinese: 不过当族群灭绝时，我也得遗憾的通知你考核失败了。

English: Okay, is that all clear now? Then let's officially start the test!
Chinese: 好吧，现在都明白了吗？那让我们正式开始考核吧！
